verses.name: Mark 14:23
verses.text: And he took the cup, and when he had given thanks, he gave it to them: and they all drank of it.

verses.name: Mark 14:24
verses.text: And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.

verses.name: Mark 14:25
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine, until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God.

verses.name: Mark 14:26
verses.text: And when they had sung an hymn, they went out into the mount of Olives.
